results.name: Inverse permutation to sequence A246278 when it is considered as a permutation of natural numbers (with assumption that a(1) = 1).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
formula: As a composition of related permutations:
xref: Inverse of array A246278 considered as a permutation of natural numbers with prepended a(1) = 1.
Related permutations A122111, A156552, A246276, A253552, A253562.
Differs from A252460 for the first time at n=21, where a(21) = 18, while A252460(21) = 13.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jan 03 2015
